title: Getting this message when trying to activate a new Pixel 4: This device belongs to your organization
content:
I had bought a brand new Pixel 4 device on ebay but when I am trying to activate the device I am getting this message: This device belongs to your organization
If I am pressing the "IT admin" link I am presented with another screen with Google support mail which seems to be obsolete. Is there anyway to contact google to understand if this device is stolen?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
